alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:53PM CDT until June 15 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Western Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Lamar to 7 miles southeast of Gerty, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Alderson... Ashland... Higgins... Haywood... Mcalester Regional Airport... Scipio... Dunbar... Blanco... Haileyville... Pittsburg... Arpelar... Gowen... Dow... Bache... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
